books.name: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.details: A witty exploration of love and social expectations through the relationship between Elizabeth Bennet and Mr. Darcy.

books.name: The Client
books.author: John Grisham
books.details: A young boy becomes embroiled in a dangerous conspiracy after witnessing a crime, leading to a high-stakes legal battle.

books.name: The Three Musketeers
books.author: Alexandre Dumas
books.details: Follows the adventures of d'Artagnan and his friendships with Athos, Porthos, and Aramis as they navigate love and betrayal in 17th-century France.

books.name: The Count of Monte Cristo
books.author: Alexandre Dumas
books.details: A tale of revenge and redemption as Edmond Dantès seeks justice after being wrongfully imprisoned.

books.name: Un avion sans elle
books.author: Michel Bussi
books.details: After a plane crash, two girls are found, but only one is presumed to be the real daughter of a wealthy family, leading to a gripping investigation.

books.name: Me Before You
books.author: Jojo Moyes
books.details: A touching story about a caregiver and her relationship with a man who has lost his will to live, exploring love and transformation.

books.name: Gone Girl
books.author: Gillian Flynn
books.details: A gripping narrative about a marriage that takes a dark turn when the wife goes missing, revealing secrets and manipulations.

books.name: The Ghost
books.author: Danielle Steel
books.details: A love story between a writer and a mysterious artist, intertwined with secrets from the past.

books.name: Ne tirez pas sur l'oiseau moqueur
books.author: Harper Lee
books.details: A powerful narrative about racial injustice seen through the eyes of a young girl in the American South.

books.name: Llama Llama Red Pajama
books.author: Anna Dewdney
books.details: A sweet bedtime story about a young llama's worries as he waits for his mama.

books.name: Les Trois Petits Cochons
books.author: Traditional
books.details: The classic tale of the three little pigs and the big bad wolf, teaching the importance of hard work and perseverance.

books.name: Le Petit Prince
books.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
books.category: A poetic tale about a young prince who travels from planet to planet, exploring themes of love, loss, and friendship.

books.name: The Very Hungry Caterpillar
books.author: Eric Carle
books.details: A classic children's book about a caterpillar's transformation into a butterfly.

books.name: Where the Wild Things Are
books.author: Maurice Sendak
books.details: A story of a boy's adventure to an island inhabited by wild creatures.

books.name: Brown Bear, Brown Bear, What Do You See?
books.author: Bill Martin Jr. and Eric Carle
books.details: A rhythmic tale that introduces colors and animals to young readers.
